We congratulate the Kingdom of Bahrain and its people for their national celebrations, the anniversary of the founding of the United Nations, the anniversary of the accession of the United Nations, the anniversary of the accession of King Hamad bin Isa to power.
The joys of the Kingdom of Bahrain are our joys and proud of their long history. It is our pride. The Kingdom's success in establishing growth despite the challenges is also a great success for us.

Yesterday, some of the reactions that were initiated by independent prosecutors and exceeded the limits in front of the operation, which is fully executed in law, are on display.
All actors of old Turkey are trying to put pressure on our prosecutors, judges and police officers in case of alliance.
We will never give our judges and prosecutors an opportunity to be intimidated or influenced by our security officers.
Whoever threatens our national security will receive the necessary response; we can not make them dominate in this country.
The EU, our security forces and a lawyer's call, do not seek the authority to intervene in itself, we cut our own beliefs ourselves.
I believe that the normalized legal system will not allow innocent people to be punished and criminals to wiggle their arms.
In no period of history of oppression and betrayal, they will not be returned in any place nor will they be free in Turkey.

RT @TVNBR: President Dilma Rousseff addresses the inauguration ceremony of the new Board and Fiscal Council of #CNA. See on @TVNBR http: //t.co...
The advisory now assumes this profile to tweet the president's speech during the inauguration of the CNA's board of directors.
Agriculture is a segment that produces what feeds the people and, above all, the Brazilian people.
One of the factors of prosperity in Brazil is represented by rural producers, family farmers and middle entrepreneurs of the field.
We are increasing productivity without giving up the protection and preservation of the environment.
There will be no lack of adequate conditions or resources to continue to strengthen production.
We have 4 years ahead and reaffirm: the agribusiness claims will always be a goal for the policies of support to the sector.
I am committed to translating the partnership into new and greater achievements and achievements.
I intend to continue working with industrialists and rural workers, respecting the autonomy of the representative entities.
I wish for great success and great achievements for the agribusiness and the Brazilian producer.

The tuita counsel now addresses the president at the presentation ceremony of new general officers.
RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo - President Dilma addresses the ceremony of the presentation of promoted general officers of the Armed Forces: http ...
I congratulate the newly promoted general officers for this achievement, the fruit of a career marked by competence, discipline and dedication.
Canada stands w / the people of Pakistan in the wake of this horrific act of violence against children.
Brazil counts on the professionalism of you in this new stage of your careers.
I am sure they will continue honoring the commitment to defend the sovereignty, the constitutional powers and the democracy of our Country.
My government has given great attention to the needs of the Armed Forces.
This is reflected in the modernization of the operational means of the three Commands, as well as in the valorization of the military career.
With the National Defense Policy and Strategy, Brazil has a certain course for the protection of its sovereignty (...)
(...) subject that interests all sectors of society and guides the emphasis that we have given to defense policy.
It is these reasons that allow me to say that, at the end of my first term, we are safer at sea, on land and in the air.

Our relations with Qatar brotherhood .. And our ties with them historic .. And we loved them brotherly love for his brother .. And friend to his friend .. We ask God to keep the people of Qatar and the people of the Gulf

RT @portalbrasil: Follow the speech of the president Dilma Rousseff at the lunch of fraternization of the Armed Forces. http://t.co/xSBUT3gadO
I thank the Navy, the Army, the Air Force and the Ministry of Defense for their services to Brazil in 2014.
In Operation Agate 8, the Armed Forces acted in the repression and prevention of crime in the country's border area.
During the World Cup, they helped ensure that the event took place in a climate of celebration and security.
In the last October elections, they gave important support so that the biggest celebration of democracy could take place in an atmosphere of tranquility.
The Armed Forces have also undertaken actions to assist the population, in support of public security in the states ...
... and relief in situations of public calamity, including the population of the semiarid during one of the worst droughts in our history.
The responsibilities of the Brazilian State for its sovereignty are non-transferable. A peaceful country can not be confused with a defenseless country.
The size of our country's wealth requires that we be able to protect them from any kind of threat.
That is why my government has given great attention to the Armed Forces.
We have worked on two fronts: valuing, increasingly, the military career and investing heavily to transform the profile of our weapons.
In Brazil and abroad, our men and women in uniform stand out for their professionalism, patriotism and dedication.
I reaffirm my satisfaction with the growing female presence in military schools, which, I am sure, will grow even more in the future.
In Brazil today, defense and democracy go together. We implemented the Law on Access to Information in the Ministry of Defense.
In Brazil we are building, defense, development and democracy reinforce each other.
It is with the certainty of the dedication of the Armed Forces to the strengthening of this virtuous circle that I thank for the good services rendered in 2014.
